headline: Canadian Metals Announces Closing of $2.4 Million Private Placement
summary: Montreal, Quebec--(Newsfile Corp. - December 4, 2025) - Canadian Metals Inc. (CSE: CME) ("CME" or the "Company") is pleased to announce that it has completed a non-brokered private placement (the "Private Placement"), pursuant to which it has issued 9,230,770 units of the Company (each a "Unit") at a price of $0.13 per Unit and 8,571,427 "flow-through" units (each a "FT Unit") at a price of $0.14 per FT Unit, for total cumulative gross proceeds of $2,399,999.88. Each Unit is comprised of one...

headline: Jim Cramer on Vertiv: “I Think It’s a Buy Right Here”
summary: Vertiv Holdings Co (NYSE:VRT) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer was recently asked about. Highlighting the cooling system failure at a data center of CME Group, a caller asked if it could affect Vertiv. Cramer replied: “Well, I think Vertiv actually opened down today because people felt that they were somehow involved with what […]
